1) Two Samsung TVs have been detected in the environment: the Samsung The Frame (49) and the Samsung 8 Series (82). The Frame TV is identified by the device ID 415228e4-456c-44b1-8602-70f98c67fba8, while the 8 Series TV is identified by the device ID 8e20883f-c444-4edf-86bf-64e74c1d70e2. 2) The current state of the Samsung The Frame (49) TV shows that it does not have a channel set, while the Samsung 8 Series (82) TV is tuned to channel 42. Both TVs support power-on via OCF and have media playback capabilities, including play, pause, stop, fast forward, and rewind. The actionable controls available include adjusting the power state, volume, and switching input sources, with the 8 Series TV actively displaying content on channel 42.
